Overview.content: We show how to place the Facebook "Like Button" as a script in the demo article content and give a formatter that renders the script - but only if the content is not edited or moved. In such a case a reload is necessary.

Teaser.content: You need to add a script of a foreign provider, e.g., a Facebook Like-button? - Here's how to do it right.
